import "./Booking.css"; import { DateRange } from "react-date-range"; import Navbar from "../../components/navbar/Navbar"; import { useLocation, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; const Booking = () => { const location = useLocation(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [date, setDate] = useState([ { startDate: location.state.date[0].startDate, endDate: location.state.date[0].endDate, key: "selection", }, ]); const [info, setInfo] = useState({ fullName: "", email: "", phoneNumber: "", idNumber: "", }); const [rooms, setRooms] = useState([]); const [price, setPrice] = useState([]); const [totalBill, setTotalBill] = useState(0); const user = location.state.user; const hotel = location.state.hotel; const options = location.state.options; useEffect(() => { const roomId = { id: hotel.rooms, options: options, }; const postRoom = () => { fetch("http://localhost:5000/room", { method: "POST", body: JSON.stringify(roomId), headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, }) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => { setRooms(data); }) .catch((err) => console.log(err)); }; postRoom(); }, []); useEffect(() => {}, []); return (

{hotel.desc}

${hotel.cheapestPrice} (1 night)

{" "}

Dates

setDate([item.selection])} showSelectionPreview={true} ranges={date} direction="horizontal" />

setInfo({ ...info, fullName: e.target.value }) } />
setInfo({ ...info, email: e.target.value })} />
setInfo({ ...info, phoneNumber: e.target.value }) } />
setInfo({ ...info, idNumber: e.target.value }) } />

Select Rooms

{room.title}

{room.desc}

Max people : {room.maxPeople}

${room.price}

  • handleChange(e, room.price, room._id) } />

)) ) : (

Pay nothing until Septermber 04, 2000

Max people : 2

$350

)}

Total Bill: ${totalBill}

); }; export default Booking;
